broadcast.spawn:
<blue>The mythical entity, <yellow>Zapdos</yellow>, has been spotted in <light_purple>{biome}!
<gray>It will be available for the next <green>{duration}</green> minutes.</gray>

<blue>Closest player: <aqua>{player_name.spawned}</aqua>
broadcast.capture: <blue>The mythical entity, <yellow>Zapdos</yellow>, has been captured by <aqua>{player_name.acted}</aqua>!</blue>
broadcast.kill: <blue>The mythical entity, <yellow>Zapdos</yellow>, has been killed by <aqua>{player_name.acted}</aqua>!</blue>
